TopicTitle: Stuck with the above posters avatar (Redux)

Articles.Content: Hi there! Thought you could escape my gravity? Or my surface? CRUSHING TIME!
Floor 3: i walk in and sweep up the crushed bodies while muttering to my self
floor 4: I walk in and try to strike up a conversation about the fallen

floor 5: i walk in again and skin the rabid squirrel while integrating it about the fallen( at the time it was a rabid squirrel)

Edited April 21, 2014 by toolofdarkness

I walk in casually on floor 6 and say "SUP" to this evil looking dude on the bike... I momentarily double take wondering how he fit a bike in the elevator. but shrug and continue on.

(nice reset by the way)

I step inside on floor 7 and notice a creeper. I keep my distance away from it to not let it explode.

Edited April 22, 2014 by Xaelath
Forgot to add floor number.

Floor 8 i walk in and give the funny green alien a cake and a gold ingot.

(thx and its not a bike thats my leg. my avatar is a Space marine. to be more specific its an dark angel interrogator chaplain.)
I enter on floor 9 and begin to melt the elevator.
I begin to orbit you once i reach floor 10.
I get in on floor 11 and immediately mind control everyone in the elevator, and start them all jumping up and down
Floor 12: i walk in to the elevator with a librarian who commences in a psychic battle with strandedonEarth while i fix the elevator
Floor 13: i walk into the elevator and see the (you have a tiny avatar) guy with a cape and staff thing and just mind my business as i check my watch
Floor 14: I waddle in, and keep poking the weird astronaut dude with a stick I found in the "Do Not Break Glass" glass.
Floor 15: I walk in and throw my pokeball at the mudkip-brony crossbreed sitting on the floor.
I walk in on Floor 16 and take off my helmet, and stare at the person who just caught a mudkip-brony crossbreed.
i walk in on the 17th floor and give the other Astronaut/cosmonaut a salute
Floor 18: I walk in and see a slightly familiar astronaut, and do the raindance.
I step into the elevator on Floor 19, extremely sodden by the sudden and violent rainfall. I stand to one corner and say nothing.

Floor 20. I walk into the up/down crawling box where humans (and other things) seems to enjoy coming and going all the time. There's a shy square-headed green dude on the corner, looking at his feet. With a meow I get his attention, and when he looks at me I clean my throat and, with a short pronounce, I say: "No".
Floor 21; I find a cat, eerie quietness ensues as the feline just watches in judging eyes. It utters, small and dully, "Jetpacks are lame" before huddling out of the lift
I walk in on floor 22 and look at the guy with a jetpack and a lightsaber(?). I proceed to take off my helmet and enjoy some snacks.
On floor 23, I step into the elevator and witness an odd green creature, who seems to be eating some kind of food. I snatch the creature's helmet and prepare to bolt out the door when they next open.
Floor 24: I lock eyes with a fire/dragon type, and prepare to battle.

I enter the elevator on floor 25, see the strange creature already aboard, then promptly ignore it.

...

I just realized that this must be a Time Lord elevator. It's bigger on the inside than you would think possible.
Entering the elevator in floor 26. Wait... there's a freaking SPACESHIP inside it! Holy moses! I try to get out of the elevator but it's too late, the doors shuts in my face.
